``` ::: ::: #### Q5. ::: {#6b630358 .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt plt.clf() large_small_count = df_midwest["large_small"].value_counts() large_small_count.plot.bar(rot=0,color="red") plt.show() # 또다른 그래프 만드는 방법 import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.pyplot as plt plt.clf() sns.countplot(data=df_midwest, x="large_small", color="yellow", dodge=True) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-9-output-1.png){width=575 height=429} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-9-output-2.png){width=593 height=429} ::: :::
